nodes.text: Pindy Streeto was a female Human who was a member of the Rancor Riders, a criminal gang that operated on Tolea Biqua during the Clone Wars. Zelice Sturm paid her to help her monitor the gang's interactions with the Heroes of Cularin and afterwards, she paid for Streeto to leave the Cularin system. Sturm later assumed Streeto's identity, to try and confuse the heroes.
